h1_title: Daoist's Basket of Fire and Water
content: With the Daoist's Basket of Fire and Water equipped your Burn-inflicting and Chill-inflicting Transformation Spells will have their attack power moderately increased.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Daoist's_Basket_of_Fire_and_Water.md', within the main section titled 'Daoist's Basket of Fire and Water'.
The content is as follows:
With the Daoist's Basket of Fire and Water equipped your Burn-inflicting and Chill-inflicting Transformation Spells will have their attack power moderately increased.
